definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: And as he prayed, the fashion of his countenance was altered, and his raiment was white and glistering.
sentences.chinese: 正禱告的時候，他的面貌就改變了，衣服潔白放光。

sentences.english: It shall be as white as snow By Your blood and bitter passion.
sentences.chinese: 卻被你十字架所流寶血潔淨，潔白如雪。

sentences.english: His countenance was like lightning, and his raiment white as snow
sentences.chinese: 他的像貌如同閃電，衣服潔白如雪。

sentences.english: Do not intoxicating fragrance of the bamboo flowers, petals small, white and delicate and charming.
sentences.chinese: 竹花沒有醉人的馨香，花瓣很小，潔白而楚楚可憐。

sentences.english: Here in winter snow, snow mountains everywhere and a piece of white.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的冬天白雪皚皚，到處銀裝素裹，一片潔白。

sentences.english: The bean curd looks spotlessly white and tender.
sentences.chinese: 豆腐看上去潔白無瑕，喫起來鮮嫩無比。

sentences.english: Seven Black Plaid Shorts over the knee, with white and smooth skin.
sentences.chinese: 七分黑格子短褲捲過了膝蓋，露出潔白光滑的肌膚。

sentences.english: She was dressed in virginal white.
sentences.chinese: 她穿了一身潔白無瑕的衣服。

sentences.english: Their flowers are always small and white.
sentences.chinese: 它們的花總是小而潔白。

sentences.english: Satin Ni made from emulsion micelles has softness appearance and pure white color.
sentences.chinese: 添加乳液膠束所鍍得的緞面鎳，外觀柔和，色澤潔白。

sentences.english: Perhaps, pure canvas shoes and doodle.
sentences.chinese: 或者，潔白的帆布鞋和塗鴉。

sentences.english: How wanton thy waters her snowy feet lave.
sentences.chinese: 你的流水如此頑皮，濯滌着她潔白的雙足。

sentences.english: A. When he laughs, we see his pearl-white even teeth.
sentences.chinese: 當他笑的時候，我們看見他有一口整齊潔白的牙齒。

sentences.english: Always be clothed in white, and always anoint your head with oil.
sentences.chinese: 你的衣服當時常潔白，你頭上也不要缺少膏油。

sentences.english: Thick long stipe, fleshy pileus, pure white.
sentences.chinese: 柄粗長，棒狀，蓋肥厚，潔白。

sentences.english: As white as snow" is a good example of a simile.
sentences.chinese: “潔白如雪”是一個明喻的好例子。

definition: Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
(of sb or sth) whole or entire body
mellow and full/suave/smooth and round/rich (in voice)
